text: i know what it means, sheldon! god, you know, i have been in l.a. for almost two years now, and i haven't got a single acting job, i have accomplished nothing, haven't gotten a raise at work, haven't even had sex in six months, and just now when i was walking up those stairs a fly flew in my mouth and i ate it.
